This extension can be used for creating campaigns and to copy the URL of created campaigns by integrating with the DiGGrowth platform. Say goodbye to chaotic spreadsheets and keep your team in sync with a new way of campaign data harmonization. 

The extension also makes it easy to create UTM/cid templates and generate tracking codes, so that your team can work efficiently.
